CustomField.formula: IF ( CONTAINS(Product_Ordered__c, "single"), 1, IF ( CONTAINS(Product_Ordered__c, "twins"), 2, IF ( CONTAINS(Product_Ordered__c, "triplets"), 3, IF ( CONTAINS(Product_Ordered__c, "SINGLE"), 1, IF ( CONTAINS(Product_Ordered__c, "TWINS"), 2, IF ( CONTAINS(Product_Ordered__c, "TRIPLES"), 3, IF ( Number_of_Births__c = "Single", 1, IF ( Number_of_Births__c = "Twins", 2, IF ( Number_of_Births__c = "Triples", 3, 0)))))))))
CustomField.label: Number of Kits
